name: hoodik
description: Hoodik is an open source alternative to Sentry for error and performance monitoring. It collects application events and shows them in a unified dashboard with filtering and alerting to help developers fix issues faster.

features.title: High Performance
features.description: Monitor application performance and identify slow operations

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: View all errors and performance data in a single interface

features.title: Filtering System
features.description: Filter events by severity, environment, or custom criteria

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Set up notifications for critical errors or performance issues

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Keep all error data and user information on your infrastructure
